column5: Said she wanted fall colours and waterfall(s)  Sooooo  18 x24  "Carol's Creek"
If it only had a coloured up coho jumping the falls then it would be perfect!!!!
Looks great, did you paint it?
Matt---Yup---maybe you've heard of me---I'm Canada's best 6 fingered near sighted artist  Just kidd'n---Ya I show new outdoorsy things here when I paint em
maybe u can ask twocoda for permission to borrow his pics of trout jumping the dam

Wow I have seen a few of your paintings and they are awesome I love art myself and I draw a ton I have the most respect for painters as I know how hard it is. I can't paint at all lol. Made on good painting in my life and wasn't like that. So hard to work colours together and shade with paint but you truly do a great job with it. Good work hope to see more. I thought you were going to say maybe you have heard of me Im from Canada's group of seven lol. Regarles that is some great work.  Chris.

Thanks Chris---you are very kind  I post outdoorsy paintings on here just for something different--or add variety to the board.  Sometimes these places are just somewhere I'd like to be.  Thanks Again
No problem I really like your art and wish I could paint like that, I love going to Algonquin and portaging in some lakes and just draw some of the beauty out there.
